title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes are applied immediately.
OB: After removing a working set, the package view is not filtered and all the projects/packages are still visible.
EB: After removing a working set, the package view should be filtered and only the remaining working set(s) should be visible.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should be filtered.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. 
3. Delete the first working set.
4. Verify that after removing the first working set, the package view is still filtered and only the remaining working set(s) are visible.
